snippet: How many viral stories on the Internet do you read, share, reference and comment on each week? How much do you care if they are real? How would you find out if they were real?
abstract: How many viral stories on the Internet do you read, share, reference and comment on each week? How much do you care if they are real? How would you find out if they were real?

headline.main: How Do You Know if What You Read Online Is True?
